# NSVoIPUsageDescription

**Property List Key**

A message that tells people why your app receives voice-over-IP (VoIP) calls in the background.

## Discussion

For more information, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CallKit].
title: NSVoIPUsageDescription
